title: Splunk security advisory (AV25-168)
description: On March 26, 2025, Splunk published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: Splunk Enterprise  versions prior to 9.4.0, 9.3.3, 9.2.5 and 9.1.8
Splunk Cloud Platform  versions prior to 9.3.2408.104, 9.2.2406.108, 9.2.2403.114 and 9.1.2312.208
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
